item.title: Regional news 2020-05-05
item.description: Contents Al-Araby Al-Jadeed Al-Sharq Al-Awsat Aljazeera Alarabiya Al-Quds Al-Araby Raâ€™i Al-Youm Al-Araby Al-Jadeed Fears that imprisoned Saudi Princess Basma bint Saudi may have Corona Last month, the princess wrote on her twitter that she is imprisoned in Hair prison and her health is quickly deteriorating. She said he condition is critical and may lead to her death. She added that she has not received any medical assistance.
